channel.title: Aperol on Cocktails collected by Daniel Mentiplay
channel.description: Recent content in Aperol on Cocktails collected by Daniel Mentiplay

item.title: Paper plane
item.description: Ingredients 20ml bourbon 20ml Aperol 20ml Amaro Nonino or Montenegro 20ml lemon juice lemon twist Instructions Shake ingredients. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist (or miniature paper plane).

item.title: Spritz Veneziano
item.description: Ingredients 60 ml prosecco 45 ml Aperol 20 ml soda water orange slice olive Instructions Build in wine glass over ice. Garnish with orange slice and olive.
